name: LegionellosisTestsForLegionellaSpeciesNucleicAcid
title: Legionellosis (Tests for Legionella species Nucleic Acid)
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains codes for laboratory test names associated with detecting the presence of Legionella species Nucleic Acid),(Data Element Scope: Laboratory tests names that were ordered or observed.),(Inclusion Criteria: component: legionella nucleic acid),(Exclusion Criteria: none)
